testcase.name: As guest user I can create a new account
testcase.system-out: Given I am on home page.....................................................passed Given I click Sign in button................................................passed When I enter email address in create account form...........................passed And I click Create an account button........................................passed And I enter first name as "Sara"............................................passed And I enter last name as "Elizabeth"........................................passed And I enter password as "choucair123".......................................passed And I enter address as "450 Serra Mall".....................................passed And I enter city as "Stanford"..............................................passed And I select state..........................................................passed And I enter Postal code as 94305............................................passed And I enter mobile phone as 65072323........................................passed When I click the button Register............................................passed Then I am navigated to My account page......................................passed And I see my account information............................................passed

testcase.name: As guest user I can search products on the search bar
testcase.system-out: Given I am on home page.....................................................passed Given I enter "Printed Dress" on search bar.................................passed When I click search button..................................................passed Then the page returns the product "Printed Dress"...........................passed
